alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:02AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND... SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING...NORTHEASTERN UNION AND SOUTHWESTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM EDT... At 801 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montoursville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Montoursville, Muncy, Watsontown, Hughesville, Montgomery, Allenwood, Elimsport, Kettle Creek Gorge, Lairdsville, Delaware Run, Muncy Valley, Barbours, South Williamsport, Picture Rocks, Eagles Mere, Hillsgrove, Williamsport Airport and Little League World Series Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lycoming; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Union
